name: TheHive
natural_language_description: 这是 TheHive 节点。主要用于: Consume TheHive API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: alert | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll | (必填项)
available_options: Execute Responder (值: executeResponder) - Execute a responder on a selected log
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many task logs
Get (值: get) - Get a single log

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

id.name: id
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Log ID | (必填项)

caseId.name: caseId
caseId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Case ID | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Task details | (必填项)

description.name: description
description.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Description of the case | (必填项)

severity.name: severity
severity.natural_language_description: 参数名: Severity | 作用: Severity of the alert. Default=Medium. | 默认值: 2 | (必填项)

date.name: date
date.description: Date and time when the alert was raised default=now
date.natural_language_description: 参数名: Date | 作用: Date and time when the alert was raised default=now | (必填项)

tlp.name: tlp
tlp.natural_language_description: 参数名: TLP | 作用: Traffict Light Protocol (TLP). Default=Amber. | 默认值: 2 | (必填项)

status.name: status
status.description: Status of the log (Ok or Deleted) default=Ok
status.natural_language_description: 参数名: Status | 作用: Status of the log (Ok or Deleted) default=Ok | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Type of the alert | (必填项)

source.name: source
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source | 作用: Source of the alert | (必填项)

sourceRef.name: sourceRef
sourceRef.natural_language_description: 参数名: SourceRef | 作用: Source reference of the alert | (必填项)

follow.name: follow
follow.description: Whether the alert becomes active when updated default=true
follow.natural_language_description: 参数名: Follow | 作用: Whether the alert becomes active when updated default=true | 默认值: True | (必填项)

artifactUi.name: artifactUi
artifactUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Artifacts | 作用: Artifact attributes | 默认值: {}

responder.name: responder
responder.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
responder.natural_language_description: 参数名: Responder Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: True

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: caseTemplate (值: None) - Case template to use when a case is created from this alert

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: endDate (值: None) - Date of the end of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Completed.
flag (值: None) - Whether to flag the task. Default=false.
owner (值: None) - User who owns the task. This is automatically set to current user when status is set to InProgress.
startDate (值: None) - Date of the beginning of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Open.
status (值: None) - Status of the task. Default=Waiting.

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: attachmentValues (值: None) - File attached to the log

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: endDate (值: None) - Date of the end of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Completed.
flag (值: None) - Whether to flag the task. Default=false.
owner (值: None) - User who owns the task. This is automatically set to current user when status is set to InProgress.
startDate (值: None) - Date of the beginning of the task. This is automatically set when status is set to Open.
status (值: None) - Status of the task. Default=Waiting.

dataType.name: dataType
dataType.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
dataType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Type Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.description: The name of the input binary field that represent the attachment file
binaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 作用: The name of the input binary field that represent the attachment file | 默认值: data | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: Content of the Log | (必填项)

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: Date of the log submission default=now
startDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Date | 作用: Date of the log submission default=now | (必填项)

ioc.name: ioc
ioc.description: Whether the observable is an IOC (Indicator of compromise)
ioc.natural_language_description: 参数名: IOC | 作用: Whether the observable is an IOC (Indicator of compromise) | 默认值: False | (必填项)

sighted.name: sighted
sighted.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sighted | 作用: Whether sighted previously | 默认值: False | (必填项)

analyzers.name: analyzers
analyzers.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
analyzers.natural_language_description: 参数名: Analyzer Names or IDs | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

flag.name: flag
flag.description: Whether to flag the task. Default=false.
flag.natural_language_description: 参数名: Flag | 作用: Whether to flag the task. Default=false. | 默认值: False | (必填项)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | 作用: ID of the task | (必填项)
